title: 28 House Cats Having the Time of Their Lives Caught on Candid Camera
description: House cats combine two things that we hoomans so dearly revere. One is their ability to stay young in their mind, retaining moments of innocence and wonder that we have long forgotten about. And two, is their ability to do exactly what they want and have a plethora of ideas stored up. This inevitably leads them to having the time of their lives no matter what they get up to, because it is always full of wonder and always something they really want to do. And seeing how they usually get up to their shenanigans at night while we sleep or when we are away at work, we figured we would share some of these sweet moments with you such that you don't miss out.So without further delay we hope these hilarious house cats make your day.
author: Laurent Shinar
excerpt: 28 House Cats Having the Time of Their Lives Caught on Candid Camera - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: Not that we needed to be reminded of the fairy princess status of our cat children, but it is nice from time to time to see them in their true form. The form that is conveniently hidden between the hours of 1am and 6am when they appear to be devilish creatures who will stop at nothing to tear down the house while singing the songs of their people. Honestly, one of the best ideas for garden ornaments that has ever been proposed. This way, not only does your cat get to enjoy the garden, they will also remain loyal to you. Well, you and the garden ornaments that you bought. Don’t worry, they won't start to choose the ornaments over you, the ornaments can't feed them.
html:
Not that we needed to be reminded of the fairy princess status of our cat children, but it is nice from time to time to see them in their true form. The form that is conveniently hidden between the hours of 1am and 6am when they appear to be devilish creatures who will stop at nothing to tear down the house while singing the songs of their people.

Honestly, one of the best ideas for garden ornaments that has ever been proposed. This way, not only does your cat get to enjoy the garden, they will also remain loyal to you. Well, you and the garden ornaments that you bought. Don’t worry, they won't start to choose the ornaments over you, the ornaments can't feed them.
